topic.title: Changing the Hyper-threading Status
topic.shortdesc: The hyper-threading status is controlled by the BIOS settings of the host.

ol.li: Lock the host to prepare it for configuration changes.

Edit the host BIOS settings to enable or disable hyper-threading.
For more about editing the BIOS, refer to the documentation provided by the maker of the host computer.
Unlock the host to make it available for use.

Confirm the hyper-threading status in HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade.
The hyper-threading status is reported on the Processor tab for the host. For more information, see .
